title: Add PIN code field with manual entry and auto-fill to all registration forms

requirements.summary: Add PIN code input field to Careers registration form with 6-digit validation
acceptanceCriteria: PIN code field is visible in the careers registration form
Field accepts 6-digit numeric input
Field is labeled clearly as 'PIN Code' or 'Postal Code'

file_operations.description: Add a PIN code input field to the careers registration form that accepts manual entry of 6-digit postal codes. Include validation to ensure only numeric input with exactly 6 digits. Position the field appropriately in the existing form layout before city and state fields.

requirements.summary: Implement PIN code auto-fill functionality for Careers form city and state fields
acceptanceCriteria: When a 6-digit PIN code is entered, city and state fields are automatically populated
Invalid PIN codes show appropriate error or leave fields empty
Auto-filled fields are editable by the user if needed

file_operations.description: Implement auto-fill logic that triggers when a valid 6-digit PIN code is entered. Use the PIN code lookup utility to fetch city and state information and populate the corresponding form fields. Handle loading states during lookup and error states for invalid PIN codes. Ensure auto-filled fields remain editable by users.

requirements.summary: Create PIN code lookup utility for mapping Indian postal codes to city and state
acceptanceCriteria: Utility can accept a 6-digit PIN code and return city and state
Covers major Indian postal codes
Returns appropriate response for invalid or unknown PIN codes

file_operations.description: Create a utility module that provides PIN code lookup functionality for Indian postal codes. Implement a function that accepts a 6-digit PIN code string and returns city and state information. Use a public API service (such as India Post API or postal.co.in) to fetch location data. Include proper error handling for invalid PIN codes, network failures, and unknown postal codes. Export a typed interface for the lookup response containing city and state fields. Consider caching frequently looked-up PIN codes to improve performance.
